4я╕ПтГг App.jsx тАУ Full Collaborative Editor

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { View, TextInput, Button, ScrollView, Text, TouchableOpacity, Dimensions } from 'react-native';
import { db, auth } from './firebase';
import { collection, query, orderBy, onSnapshot, addDoc, updateDoc, doc } from 'firebase/firestore';
import { createUserWithEmailAndPassword, signInWithEmailAndPassword, signOut } from 'firebase/auth';
import DraggableFlatList from 'react-native-draggable-flatlist';
import AsyncStorage from '@react-native-async-storage/async-storage';
import { PDFDocument, rgb, StandardFonts } from 'pdf-lib';
import * as FileSystem from 'expo-file-system';
import * as Sharing from 'expo-sharing';
import { ColorPicker } from 'react-native-color-picker';

export default function App() {
  const [user,setUser]=useState(null);
  const [email,setEmail]=useState('');
  const [password,setPassword]=useState('');
  const [sections,setSections]=useState([]);
  const [logoFile,setLogoFile]=useState(null);
  const [bannerFile,setBannerFile]=useState(null);

  const sectionsCol = collection(db,'sections');
  const historyCol = collection(db,'history');

  useEffect(()=>{ const unsubscribe=auth.onAuthStateChanged(u=>setUser(u)); return unsubscribe; },[]);

  useEffect(()=>{
    const loadOffline=async()=>{
      const stored=await AsyncStorage.getItem('sections');
      if(stored) setSections(JSON.parse(stored));
    };
    loadOffline();
  },[]);

  useEffect(()=>{
    AsyncStorage.setItem('sections',JSON.stringify(sections));
    if(navigator.onLine){
      sections.forEach(async sec=>{
        if(sec.id){
          const secRef=doc(db,'sections',sec.id);
          await updateDoc(secRef,{...sec});
        }
      });
    }
  },[sections]);

  const signup=async()=>{ const cred=await createUserWithEmailAndPassword(auth,email,password); setUser(cred.user); };
  const login=async()=>{ const cred=await signInWithEmailAndPassword(auth,email,password); setUser(cred.user); };
  const logout=async()=>{ await signOut(auth); setUser(null); };

  const addSection=async()=>{
    const newSection={ title:'New Section', color:'#05B43A', fontSize:14, items:[{text:'New Item',fontSize:12,checkboxStyle:'square',checkboxColor:'#000000'}], order:sections.length };
    setSections([...sections,newSection]);
    if(navigator.onLine) await addDoc(sectionsCol,newSection);
  };

  const addItem=async(sec)=>{
    const newItems=[...sec.items,{text:'New Item',fontSize:12,checkboxStyle:'square',checkboxColor:'#000000'}];
    setSections(sections.map(s=>s===sec?{...s,items:newItems}:s));
  };

  const updateSectionField=(sec,field,value)=>{
    setSections(sections.map(s=>s===sec?{...s,[field]:value}:s));
  };

  const updateItemField=(sec,i,field,value)=>{
    const newItems=[...sec.items];
    newItems[i][field]=value;
    setSections(sections.map(s=>s===sec?{...s,items:newItems}:s));
  };

  const handleDragEnd=({data})=>{ setSections(data); };

  const hexToRgb=hex=>{ const bigint=parseInt(hex.replace('#',''),16); return [((bigint>>16)&255)/255,((bigint>>8)&255)/255,(bigint&255)/255]; };

  const generatePDF=async()=>{
    const pdfDoc=await PDFDocument.create();
    let page=pdfDoc.addPage([595,842]);
    const {height}=page.getSize();
    let y=height-50;
    const font=await pdfDoc.embedFont(StandardFonts.Helvetica);
    const fontBold=await pdfDoc.embedFont(StandardFonts.HelveticaBold);

    if(logoFile){ const logoBytes=await FileSystem.readAsStringAsync(logoFile,{encoding:'base64'}); const logoImg=await pdfDoc.embedPng(Uint8Array.from(atob(logoBytes),c=>c.charCodeAt(0))); page.drawImage(logoImg,{x:50,y:height-80,width:50,height:50}); }
    if(bannerFile){ const bannerBytes=await FileSystem.readAsStringAsync(bannerFile,{encoding:'base64'}); const bannerImg=await pdfDoc.embedPng(Uint8Array.from(atob(bannerBytes),c=>c.charCodeAt(0))); page.drawImage(bannerImg,{x:150,y:height-220,width:200,height:100}); }

    page.drawText('Muqaddas Network',{x:50,y:height-240,size:28,font:fontBold,color:rgb(0.05,0.45,0.2)});
    y-=60;

    sections.forEach(sec=>{
      page.drawText(sec.title,{x:50,y:y,size:sec.fontSize,font:fontBold,color:rgb(...hexToRgb(sec.color))});
      y-=25;
      sec.items.forEach(item=>{
        if(y<100){ page=pdfDoc.addPage([595,842]); y=height-50; }
        page.drawRectangle({x:50,y:y-4,width:12,height:12,borderColor: rgb(...hexToRgb(item.checkboxColor)),borderWidth:1,color: rgb(1,1,1)});
        page.drawText(item.text,{x:70,y:y,size:item.fontSize,font:font,color:rgb(0,0,0)});
        y-=20;
      });
      y-=15;
    });

    const pdfBytes=await pdfDoc.save();
    const path=FileSystem.documentDirectory+'Muqaddas_Network.pdf';
    await FileSystem.writeAsStringAsync(path, pdfBytes.toString('base64'), {encoding:FileSystem.EncodingType.Base64});
    await Sharing.shareAsync(path);
  };

  if(!user) return (
    <View style={{padding:20}}>
      <TextInput placeholder="Email" value={email} onChangeText={setEmail} style={{borderWidth:1,padding:8,marginBottom:10}}/>
      <TextInput placeholder="Password" value={password} onChangeText={setPassword} secureTextEntry style={{borderWidth:1,padding:8,marginBottom:10}}/>
      <Button title="Login" onPress={login}/>
      <Button title="Signup" onPress={signup}/>
    </View>
  );

  return (
    <View style={{flex:1,padding:10}}>
      <Button title="Logout" onPress={logout}/>
      <Button title="Add Section" onPress={addSection}/>
      <DraggableFlatList
        data={sections}
        onDragEnd={handleDragEnd}
        keyExtractor={(item,index)=>index.toString()}
        renderItem={({item,index,drag})=>(
          <View style={{borderWidth:1,padding:5,marginVertical:5}}>
            <TextInput value={item.title} onChangeText={text=>updateSectionField(item,'title',text)} style={{borderWidth:1,padding:5,marginBottom:5}}/>
            <ScrollView horizontal>
              {item.items.map((it,i)=>(
                <View key={i} style={{borderWidth:1,padding:5,margin:3}}>
                  <TextInput value={it.text} onChangeText={text=>updateItemField(item,i,'text',text)} style={{borderWidth:1,padding:3}}/>
                </View>
              ))}
              <Button title="Add Item" onPress={()=>addItem(item)}/>
            </ScrollView>
          </View>
        )}
      />
      <Button title="Generate PDF" onPress={generatePDF}/>
    </View>
  );
}

2я╕ПтГг App.jsx тАУ Mobile + Tailwind UI + Enhanced PDF Preview

import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { View, TextInput, Button, Text, ScrollView, TouchableOpacity, Image } from 'react-native';
import { tailwind } from 'react-native-tailwindcss';
import { auth, db } from './firebase';
import { collection, addDoc, updateDoc, doc, onSnapshot, query, orderBy } from 'firebase/firestore';
import { createUserWithEmailAndPassword, signInWithEmailAndPassword, signOut } from 'firebase/auth';
import DraggableFlatList from 'react-native-draggable-flatlist';
import AsyncStorage from '@react-native-async-storage/async-storage';
import { PDFDocument, rgb, StandardFonts } from 'pdf-lib';
import * as FileSystem from 'expo-file-system';
import * as Sharing from 'expo-sharing';
import { ColorPicker } from 'react-native-color-picker';

export default function App() {
  const [user,setUser]=useState(null);
  const [email,setEmail]=useState('');
  const [password,setPassword]=useState('');
  const [sections,setSections]=useState([]);
  const [logoFile,setLogoFile]=useState(null);
  const [bannerFile,setBannerFile]=useState(null);

  // Auth listener
  useEffect(()=>{ const unsubscribe=auth.onAuthStateChanged(u=>setUser(u)); return unsubscribe; },[]);

  // Load offline
  useEffect(()=>{ AsyncStorage.getItem('sections').then(stored=>stored && setSections(JSON.parse(stored))); },[]);

  // Save offline + sync
  useEffect(()=>{
    AsyncStorage.setItem('sections',JSON.stringify(sections));
    if(navigator.onLine) sections.forEach(async sec=>{ if(sec.id){ const secRef=doc(db,'sections',sec.id); await updateDoc(secRef,{...sec}); } });
  },[sections]);

  const signup=async()=>{ const cred=await createUserWithEmailAndPassword(auth,email,password); setUser(cred.user); };
  const login=async()=>{ const cred=await signInWithEmailAndPassword(auth,email,password); setUser(cred.user); };
  const logout=async()=>{ await signOut(auth); setUser(null); };

  const addSection=()=>{ setSections([...sections,{ title:'New Section', color:'#05B43A', fontSize:14, items:[{text:'New Item',fontSize:12,checkboxStyle:'square',checkboxColor:'#000000'}], order:sections.length }]); };
  const addItem=(sec)=>{ const newItems=[...sec.items,{text:'New Item',fontSize:12,checkboxStyle:'square',checkboxColor:'#000000'}]; setSections(sections.map(s=>s===sec?{...s,items:newItems}:s)); };
  const updateSectionField=(sec,field,value)=>{ setSections(sections.map(s=>s===sec?{...s,[field]:value}:s)); };
  const updateItemField=(sec,i,field,value)=>{ const newItems=[...sec.items]; newItems[i][field]=value; setSections(sections.map(s=>s===sec?{...s,items:newItems}:s)); };

  const hexToRgb=hex=>{ const bigint=parseInt(hex.replace('#',''),16); return [((bigint>>16)&255)/255,((bigint>>8)&255)/255,(bigint&255)/255]; };

  const generatePDF=async()=>{
    const pdfDoc=await PDFDocument.create();
    let page=pdfDoc.addPage([595,842]);
    const {height}=page.getSize();
    let y=height-50;
    const font=await pdfDoc.embedFont(StandardFonts.Helvetica);
    const fontBold=await pdfDoc.embedFont(StandardFonts.HelveticaBold);

    // Logo/banner embed
    if(logoFile){ const logoBytes=await FileSystem.readAsStringAsync(logoFile,{encoding:'base64'}); const logoImg=await pdfDoc.embedPng(Uint8Array.from(atob(logoBytes),c=>c.charCodeAt(0))); page.drawImage(logoImg,{x:50,y:height-80,width:50,height:50}); }
    if(bannerFile){ const bannerBytes=await FileSystem.readAsStringAsync(bannerFile,{encoding:'base64'}); const bannerImg=await pdfDoc.embedPng(Uint8Array.from(atob(bannerBytes),c=>c.charCodeAt(0))); page.drawImage(bannerImg,{x:150,y:height-220,width:200,height:100}); }

    page.drawText('Muqaddas Network',{x:50,y:height-240,size:28,font:fontBold,color:rgb(0.05,0.45,0.2)});
    y-=60;

    sections.forEach(sec=>{
      page.drawText(sec.title,{x:50,y:y,size:sec.fontSize,font:fontBold,color:rgb(...hexToRgb(sec.color))});
      y-=25;
      sec.items.forEach(item=>{
        if(y<100){ page=pdfDoc.addPage([595,842]); y=height-50; }
        page.drawRectangle({x:50,y:y-4,width:12,height:12,borderColor: rgb(...hexToRgb(item.checkboxColor)),borderWidth:1,color: rgb(1,1,1)});
        page.drawText(item.text,{x:70,y:y,size:item.fontSize,font:font,color:rgb(0,0,0)});
        y-=20;
      });
      y-=15;
    });

    const pdfBytes=await pdfDoc.save();
    const path=FileSystem.documentDirectory+'Muqaddas_Network.pdf';
    await FileSystem.writeAsStringAsync(path,pdfBytes.toString('base64'),{encoding:FileSystem.EncodingType.Base64});
    await Sharing.shareAsync(path);
  };

  if(!user) return (
    <View style={tailwind.p4}>
      <TextInput placeholder="Email" value={email} onChangeText={setEmail} style={tailwind.borderP2} />
      <TextInput placeholder="Password" value={password} secureTextEntry onChangeText={setPassword} style={tailwind.borderP2} />
      <Button title="Login" onPress={login}/>
      <Button title="Signup" onPress={signup}/>
    </View>
  );

  return (
    <View style={tailwind.flex1}>
      <Button title="Logout" onPress={logout}/>
      <Button title="Add Section" onPress={addSection}/>
      <ScrollView style={tailwind.flex1}>
        <DraggableFlatList
          data={sections}
          onDragEnd={({data})=>setSections(data)}
          keyExtractor={(item,index)=>index.toString()}
          renderItem={({item,index,drag})=>(
            <View style={[tailwind.border,tailwind.p2,tailwind.m2]}>
              <TextInput value={item.title} onChangeText={text=>updateSectionField(item,'title',text)} style={tailwind.borderP1}/>
              <ScrollView horizontal>
                {item.items.map((it,i)=>(
                  <View key={i} style={[tailwind.border,tailwind.p1,tailwind.m1]}>
                    <TextInput value={it.text} onChangeText={text=>updateItemField(item,i,'text',text)} style={tailwind.borderP1}/>
                  </View>
                ))}
                <Button title="Add Item" onPress={()=>addItem(item)}/>
              </ScrollView>
            </View>
          )}
        />
      </ScrollView>
      <Button title="Generate PDF" onPress={generatePDF}/>
    </View>
  );
}

// App.jsx
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { View, TextInput, Button, Text, ScrollView, TouchableOpacity, Image } from 'react-native';
import { tailwind } from 'react-native-tailwindcss';
import AsyncStorage from '@react-native-async-storage/async-storage';
import DraggableFlatList from 'react-native-draggable-flatlist';
import { PDFDocument, StandardFonts, rgb } from 'pdf-lib';
import * as FileSystem from 'expo-file-system';
import * as Sharing from 'expo-sharing';

export default function App() {
  const [sections, setSections] = useState([]);
  const [logoFile, setLogoFile] = useState(null);
  const [bannerFile, setBannerFile] = useState(null);

  useEffect(() => {
    AsyncStorage.getItem('sections').then(data => {
      if(data) setSections(JSON.parse(data));
    });
  }, []);

  useEffect(() => {
    AsyncStorage.setItem('sections', JSON.stringify(sections));
  }, [sections]);

  const addSection = () => {
    setSections([...sections, { title:'New Section', color:'#05B43A', fontSize:16, items:[{text:'New Item', fontSize:14, checkboxColor:'#000000'}] }]);
  };

  const addItem = (sec) => {
    const newItems = [...sec.items, { text:'New Item', fontSize:14, checkboxColor:'#000000' }];
    setSections(sections.map(s => s === sec ? {...s, items:newItems} : s));
  };

  const updateSectionField = (sec, field, value) => {
    setSections(sections.map(s => s === sec ? {...s, [field]: value} : s));
  };

  const updateItemField = (sec, index, field, value) => {
    const newItems = [...sec.items];
    newItems[index][field] = value;
    setSections(sections.map(s => s === sec ? {...s, items:newItems} : s));
  };

  const hexToRgb = hex => {
    const bigint = parseInt(hex.replace('#',''),16);
    return [((bigint>>16)&255)/255, ((bigint>>8)&255)/255, (bigint&255)/255];
  };

  const generatePDF = async () => {
    const pdfDoc = await PDFDocument.create();
    let page = pdfDoc.addPage([595,842]);
    const { height } = page.getSize();
    let y = height - 50;
    const font = await pdfDoc.embedFont(StandardFonts.Helvetica);
    const fontBold = await pdfDoc.embedFont(StandardFonts.HelveticaBold);

    // Logo
    if(logoFile){
      const logoBytes = await FileSystem.readAsStringAsync(logoFile, {encoding:'base64'});
      const logoImg = await pdfDoc.embedPng(Uint8Array.from(atob(logoBytes), c=>c.charCodeAt(0)));
      page.drawImage(logoImg,{x:50, y:height-80, width:50, height:50});
    }

    // Banner
    if(bannerFile){
      const bannerBytes = await FileSystem.readAsStringAsync(bannerFile, {encoding:'base64'});
      const bannerImg = await pdfDoc.embedPng(Uint8Array.from(atob(bannerBytes), c=>c.charCodeAt(0)));
      page.drawImage(bannerImg,{x:150, y:height-220, width:200, height:100});
    }

    page.drawText('Muqaddas Network',{x:50, y:height-240, size:28, font:fontBold, color:rgb(0.05,0.45,0.2)});
    y -= 60;

    sections.forEach(sec => {
      page.drawText(sec.title,{x:50,y:y,size:sec.fontSize,font:fontBold,color:rgb(...hexToRgb(sec.color))});
      y -= 25;
      sec.items.forEach(item => {
        if(y<100){ page = pdfDoc.addPage([595,842]); y=height-50; }
        page.drawRectangle({x:50,y:y-4,width:12,height:12,borderColor: rgb(...hexToRgb(item.checkboxColor)), borderWidth:1, color:rgb(1,1,1)});
        page.drawText(item.text,{x:70,y:y,size:item.fontSize,font:font,color:rgb(0,0,0)});
        y -= 20;
      });
      y -= 15;
    });

    const pdfBytes = await pdfDoc.save();
    const path = FileSystem.documentDirectory + 'Muqaddas_Network.pdf';
    await FileSystem.writeAsStringAsync(path,pdfBytes.toString('base64'), {encoding:FileSystem.EncodingType.Base64});
    await Sharing.shareAsync(path);
  };

  return (
    <View style={tailwind.flex1}>
      <View style={[tailwind.flexRow, tailwind.justifyBetween, tailwind.m2]}>
        <Button title="Add Section" onPress={addSection} />
      </View>

      <ScrollView style={tailwind.flex1}>
        <DraggableFlatList
          data={sections}
          onDragEnd={({data}) => setSections(data)}
          keyExtractor={(item,index)=>index.toString()}
          renderItem={({item})=>(
            <View style={[tailwind.border, tailwind.p2, tailwind.m2, tailwind.rounded]}>
              <TextInput value={item.title} onChangeText={text=>updateSectionField(item,'title',text)} style={[tailwind.border, tailwind.p1, tailwind.mb2]} />
              <ScrollView horizontal>
                {item.items.map((it,i)=>(
                  <View key={i} style={[tailwind.border, tailwind.p1, tailwind.m1, tailwind.rounded]}>
                    <TextInput value={it.text} onChangeText={text=>updateItemField(item,i,'text',text)} style={[tailwind.border, tailwind.p1]} />
                  </View>
                ))}
                <Button title="Add Item" onPress={()=>addItem(item)} />
              </ScrollView>
            </View>
          )}
        />
      </ScrollView>

      <View style={tailwind.m2}>
        <Button title="Generate PDF" onPress={generatePDF}/>
      </View>
    </View>
  );
}

Upgraded Code Snippet тАУ Firestore + Offline Sync

import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
import { View, TextInput, Button, ScrollView, Text } from 'react-native';
import AsyncStorage from '@react-native-async-storage/async-storage';
import { getFirestore, collection, doc, onSnapshot, setDoc } from 'firebase/firestore';
import { initializeApp } from 'firebase/app';

const firebaseConfig = {
  apiKey: 'YOUR_API_KEY',
  authDomain: 'YOUR_PROJECT.firebaseapp.com',
  projectId: 'YOUR_PROJECT_ID',
};

const app = initializeApp(firebaseConfig);
const db = getFirestore(app);

export default function App() {
  const [sections, setSections] = useState([]);

  // Load from local storage first
  useEffect(() => {
    AsyncStorage.getItem('sections').then(data => {
      if(data) setSections(JSON.parse(data));
    });

    // Firestore live updates
    const unsub = onSnapshot(collection(db, 'sections'), snapshot => {
      snapshot.docChanges().forEach(change => {
        if(change.type === 'added' || change.type === 'modified'){
          setSections(prev => {
            const exists = prev.find(s => s.id === change.doc.id);
            if(exists){
              return prev.map(s => s.id === change.doc.id ? change.doc.data() : s);
            } else {
              return [...prev, change.doc.data()];
            }
          });
        }
      });
    });

    return () => unsub();
  }, []);

  // Save locally + Firestore
  const saveSections = async () => {
    await AsyncStorage.setItem('sections', JSON.stringify(sections));
    sections.forEach(async sec => {
      await setDoc(doc(db, 'sections', sec.id || sec.title), sec);
    });
  };

  return (
    <View style={{flex:1, padding:10}}>
      <ScrollView>
        {sections.map((sec,i)=>(
          <View key={i} style={{borderWidth:1, padding:5, marginBottom:5}}>
            <TextInput
              value={sec.title}
              onChangeText={text => setSections(sections.map(s => s===sec ? {...s, title:text} : s))}
              style={{borderWidth:1,padding:5}}
            />
            <Button title="Add Item" onPress={()=>{
              const newItems = [...sec.items, {text:'New Item'}];
              setSections(sections.map(s => s===sec ? {...s, items:newItems} : s));
            }} />
            {sec.items.map((it,j)=>(
              <Text key={j}>тАв {it.text}</Text>
            ))}
          </View>
        ))}
      </ScrollView>
      <Button title="Save & Sync" onPress={saveSections}/>
    </View>
  );
}

How Offline-First Sync Works

1. App opens тЖТ AsyncStorage loads local sections


2. Firestore listener subscribes тЖТ merges any changes from other devices


3. User edits тЖТ updates AsyncStorage immediately


4. User presses тАЬSave & SyncтАЭ тЖТ pushes updates to Firestore


5. Offline edits тЖТ synced automatically when back online

ЁЯФР ADVANCED SECURITY SIGNATURE SYSTEM (IGP Shield Layer)

ЁЯОп Objective

тАв Fake QR impossible
тАв Replay attack impossible
тАв Double claim impossible
тАв Tampering impossible
тАв Internal fraud traceable


---

ЁЯз▒ 1. GIFT SIGNATURE STRUCTURE (Server Authority Model)

Har gift create hote hi server yeh generate kare:

giftId = SHA256(senderId + receiverId + amount + timestamp + nonce)

payload = {
  giftId,
  senderId,
  receiverId,
  amount,
  timestamp,
  nonce
}

signature = HMAC_SHA256(payload, SERVER_SECRET_KEY)

Database store karega:

{
 giftId,
 payload,
 signature,
 status: "LOCKED",
 createdAt,
 expiresAt
}

Client kabhi bhi real amount store nahi karega.


---

ЁЯЫб 2. DOUBLE CLAIM PROTECTION

Claim karte waqt:

1. Client sends тЖТ giftId


2. Server verifies:

signature valid?

status == LOCKED?

expired?



3. If valid:

status = CLAIMED

transfer wallet

create immutable audit log




Second attempt = rejected instantly.


---

ЁЯФД 3. REPLAY ATTACK BLOCKER

Har gift mein:

тАв Unique nonce
тАв One-time claim token
тАв Short expiration window (optional for special gifts)

Nonce + timestamp mismatch = auto reject.


---

ЁЯзм 4. BLOCKCHAIN-STYLE IMMUTABLE AUDIT LOG

Not crypto. But same concept.

block = {
 index,
 giftId,
 previousHash,
 currentHash,
 timestamp
}

currentHash = SHA256(index + giftId + previousHash + timestamp)

Tamper = chain break.

Admin bhi silently edit nahi kar sakta.


---

ЁЯФР 5. QR SECURITY LAYER

QR code mein sirf:

giftId + shortClaimToken

Amount kabhi embed nahi hoga.

QR scan karega тЖТ server fetch karega тЖТ verify karega тЖТ then reveal karega.

тАв 10 gift attempts / min per user

ЁЯФР STEP 4 тАФ SECURITY SERVICE

ЁЯУД services/securityService.js

const crypto = require("crypto");

const SERVER_SECRET = process.env.SERVER_SECRET;

function generateGiftId(senderId, receiverId, amount, nonce) {
  return crypto
    .createHash("sha256")
    .update(senderId + receiverId + amount + Date.now() + nonce)
    .digest("hex");
}

function generateSignature(payload) {
  return crypto
    .createHmac("sha256", SERVER_SECRET)
    .update(JSON.stringify(payload))
    .digest("hex");
}

module.exports = { generateGiftId, generateSignature };

ЁЯОБ STEP 6 тАФ GIFT SERVICE (CORE LOGIC)

ЁЯУД services/giftService.js

const Gift = require("../models/Gift");
const Wallet = require("../models/Wallet");
const { generateGiftId, generateSignature } = require("./securityService");
const { checkLucky } = require("../utils/probability");
const crypto = require("crypto");

async function createGift(senderId, receiverId, amount, type) {

  const senderWallet = await Wallet.findOne({ userId: senderId });

  if (!senderWallet || senderWallet.availableBalance < amount) {
    throw new Error("Insufficient Balance");
  }

  const nonce = crypto.randomBytes(16).toString("hex");

  const giftId = generateGiftId(senderId, receiverId, amount, nonce);

  const payload = { giftId, senderId, receiverId, amount };

  const signature = generateSignature(payload);

  senderWallet.availableBalance -= amount;
  senderWallet.lockedBalance += amount;
  await senderWallet.save();

  let luckyWin = false;
  if (type === "LUCKY") {
    luckyWin = checkLucky();
  }

  const gift = await Gift.create({
    giftId,
    senderId,
    receiverId,
    amount,
    type,
    signature
  });

  return { gift, luckyWin };
}

module.exports = { createGift };

ЁЯз▒ PART 1 тАФ CLAIM GIFT SYSTEM (Secure Unlock)

ЁЯУД services/giftService.js (Add this function)

const Audit = require("../models/Audit");
const { generateSignature } = require("./securityService");

async function claimGift(giftId, claimerId) {

  const gift = await Gift.findOne({ giftId });

  if (!gift) throw new Error("Gift not found");

  if (gift.status !== "LOCKED")
    throw new Error("Already claimed or invalid");

  if (gift.receiverId !== claimerId)
    throw new Error("Unauthorized claim");

  // Verify signature again (anti tamper)
  const payload = {
    giftId: gift.giftId,
    senderId: gift.senderId,
    receiverId: gift.receiverId,
    amount: gift.amount
  };

  const expectedSignature = generateSignature(payload);

  if (expectedSignature !== gift.signature)
    throw new Error("Signature mismatch");

  // Transfer locked тЖТ receiver available
  const receiverWallet = await Wallet.findOne({ userId: claimerId });
  receiverWallet.availableBalance += gift.amount;
  await receiverWallet.save();

  gift.status = "CLAIMED";
  await gift.save();

  // Create audit block
  await createAuditBlock(gift.giftId);

  return { success: true, amount: gift.amount };
}

ЁЯУД services/audit logic (Add below claim function)

const crypto = require("crypto");

async function createAuditBlock(giftId) {

  const lastBlock = await Audit.findOne().sort({ index: -1 });

  const index = lastBlock ? lastBlock.index + 1 : 1;
  const previousHash = lastBlock ? lastBlock.currentHash : "GENESIS";

  const dataString = index + giftId + previousHash + Date.now();

  const currentHash = crypto
    .createHash("sha256")
    .update(dataString)
    .digest("hex");

  await Audit.create({
    index,
    giftId,
    previousHash,
    currentHash
  });
}

Now tampering = chain break.

ЁЯФе PART 3 тАФ COMBO ENGINE

Combo idea: If same sender sends multiple gifts within 10 sec тЖТ combo active.

ЁЯУД utils/comboEngine.js

const comboTracker = {};

function checkCombo(senderId) {

  const now = Date.now();

  if (!comboTracker[senderId]) {
    comboTracker[senderId] = { count: 1, lastTime: now };
    return 1;
  }

  const diff = now - comboTracker[senderId].lastTime;

  if (diff <= 10000) {
    comboTracker[senderId].count += 1;
  } else {
    comboTracker[senderId].count = 1;
  }

  comboTracker[senderId].lastTime = now;

  return comboTracker[senderId].count;
}

module.exports = { checkCombo };

const jwt = require("jsonwebtoken");
const bcrypt = require("bcrypt");

router.post("/login", async (req, res) => {
  const { username, password } = req.body;

  const admin = await Admin.findOne({ username });
  if (!admin) return res.status(400).json({ error: "Invalid" });

  const match = await bcrypt.compare(password, admin.passwordHash);
  if (!match) return res.status(400).json({ error: "Invalid" });

  const token = jwt.sign(
    { id: admin._id, role: admin.role },
    process.env.JWT_SECRET,
    { expiresIn: "8h" }
  );

  res.json({ token });
});

ЁЯЫб STEP 2 тАФ REQUEST WITHDRAWAL API

ЁЯУД routes/walletRoutes.js

router.post("/request-withdrawal", async (req, res) => {
  try {
    const { userId, amount, method } = req.body;

    const wallet = await Wallet.findOne({ userId });

    if (!wallet || wallet.availableBalance < amount) {
      return res.status(400).json({ error: "Insufficient balance" });
    }

    // Minimum withdrawal rule
    if (amount < 100) {
      return res.status(400).json({ error: "Minimum withdrawal тВ╣100" });
    }

    wallet.availableBalance -= amount;
    wallet.lockedBalance += amount;
    await wallet.save();

    const withdrawal = await Withdrawal.create({
      userId,
      amount,
      method
    });

    res.json({ success: true, withdrawal });

  } catch (err) {
    res.status(500).json({ error: err.message });
  }
});

  wallet.lockedBalance -= withdrawal.amount;

});

ЁЯУ▒ STEP 1 тАФ AUTH FLOW (Token Based)

Gift system tab safe hoga jab har request verified user se aaye.

Backend:

Install JWT:

Create token after login:

const jwt = require("jsonwebtoken");

function generateToken(userId) {
  return jwt.sign({ userId }, process.env.SERVER_SECRET, {
    expiresIn: "7d",
  });
}

Middleware:

function authMiddleware(req, res, next) {
  const token = req.headers.authorization?.split(" ")[1];
  if (!token) return res.status(401).json({ error: "No token" });

  try {
    const decoded = jwt.verify(token, process.env.SERVER_SECRET);
    req.user = decoded;
    next();
  } catch {
    res.status(401).json({ error: "Invalid token" });
  }
}

Now every gift route protected:

router.post("/send", authMiddleware, ...)

router.post("/webhook", async (req, res) => {

  const secret = process.env.RAZORPAY_WEBHOOK_SECRET;
  const signature = req.headers["x-razorpay-signature"];

  const crypto = require("crypto");

  const expected = crypto
    .createHmac("sha256", secret)
    .update(JSON.stringify(req.body))
    .digest("hex");

  if (expected !== signature) {
    return res.status(400).send("Invalid signature");
  }

  // Process event safely
  res.json({ status: "ok" });
});

const FraudAnalytics = require("../models/FraudAnalytics");
const User = require("../models/User");

async function trackFraud(senderId, receiverId, amount) {

  const oneMinuteAgo = new Date(Date.now() - 60000);

  const giftsLastMinute = await Gift.countDocuments({
    senderId,
    createdAt: { $gte: oneMinuteAgo }
  });

  let suspiciousScore = 0;

  if (giftsLastMinute > 20) suspiciousScore += 30;

  if (amount > 10000) suspiciousScore += 20;

  const analytics = await FraudAnalytics.create({
    userId: senderId,
    giftCount1Min: giftsLastMinute,
    totalAmount1Min: amount,
    suspiciousScore
  });

  if (suspiciousScore >= 50) {
    await User.updateOne(
      { _id: senderId },
      { isSuspicious: true }
    );
  }

  return analytics;
}

module.exports = { trackFraud };

async function generateDailyReport() {
  const today = new Date();
  const start = new Date(today.setHours(0,0,0,0));

  const totalPurchase = await Purchase.aggregate([
    { $match: { createdAt: { $gte: start } } },
    { $group: { _id: null, sum: { $sum: "$amountPaid" } } }
  ]);

  const totalWithdraw = await Withdrawal.aggregate([

      receiverId,
      amount,
      type,
      roomId
    });

      <button onClick={() => sendGift("NORMAL")}>Send Gift</button>

  );
}

// ChatBox.jsx
import { useEffect, useState } from "react";
import socket from "../socket";

function ChatBox() {
  const [messages, setMessages] = useState([]);

  useEffect(() => {
    socket.on("newMessage", (msg) => {
      setMessages(prev => [...prev, msg]);
    });

    return () => socket.off("newMessage");
  }, []);

  return (
    <div className="chat-box">
      {messages.map((m, i) => (
        <div key={i}>{m.username}: {m.text}</div>
      ))}
    </div>
  );
}

Yeh script Unity / WebGL me frontend animation trigger karega jab backend se gift event aaye.

// GiftAnimationManager.cs
using System.Collections;
using UnityEngine;
using UnityEngine.UI;

public class GiftAnimationManager : MonoBehaviour
{
    public Transform giftSpawnPoint;
    public GameObject diamondPrefab;
    public GameObject luckyPrefab;
    public GameObject comboPrefab;
    public float animationDuration = 2.0f;

    void Start()
    {
        SocketManager.OnGiftReceived += TriggerGiftAnimation;
    }

    void OnDestroy()
    {
        SocketManager.OnGiftReceived -= TriggerGiftAnimation;
    }

    void TriggerGiftAnimation(GiftData gift)
    {
        GameObject prefabToSpawn = diamondPrefab;

        if (gift.type == "LUCKY")
            prefabToSpawn = luckyPrefab;
        else if (gift.type == "COMBO")
            prefabToSpawn = comboPrefab;

        GameObject giftObj = Instantiate(prefabToSpawn, giftSpawnPoint.position, Quaternion.identity);
        StartCoroutine(PlayAnimation(giftObj, gift));
    }

    IEnumerator PlayAnimation(GameObject obj, GiftData gift)
    {
        float elapsed = 0f;
        Vector3 startScale = Vector3.zero;
        Vector3 endScale = Vector3.one;

        while (elapsed < animationDuration)
        {
            obj.transform.localScale = Vector3.Lerp(startScale, endScale, elapsed / animationDuration);
            elapsed += Time.deltaTime;
            yield return null;
        }

        obj.transform.localScale = endScale;
        yield return new WaitForSeconds(1.0f);
        Destroy(obj);
    }
}

// GiftData.cs
[System.Serializable]
public class GiftData
{
    public string senderId;
    public string receiverId;
    public string type;
    public float amount;
    public bool luckyWin;
}

Features:

Dynamic prefab spawn (Diamond, Lucky, Combo)

function Withdraw({ userId }) {

ЁЯФ╣ Core Services

securityService.js

const crypto = require("crypto");
const SERVER_SECRET = process.env.SERVER_SECRET;

function generateGiftId(senderId, receiverId, amount, nonce) {
  return crypto
    .createHash("sha256")
    .update(senderId + receiverId + amount + Date.now() + nonce)
    .digest("hex");
}

function generateSignature(payload) {
  return crypto
    .createHmac("sha256", SERVER_SECRET)
    .update(JSON.stringify(payload))
    .digest("hex");
}

module.exports = { generateGiftId, generateSignature };

probability.js

function checkLucky() {
  const WIN_PROBABILITY = 45;
  return Math.random() * 100 <= WIN_PROBABILITY;
}

module.exports = { checkLucky };

comboEngine.js

const comboTracker = {};

function checkCombo(senderId) {
  const now = Date.now();
  if (!comboTracker[senderId]) {
    comboTracker[senderId] = { count: 1, lastTime: now };
    return 1;
  }

  const diff = now - comboTracker[senderId].lastTime;
  if (diff <= 10000) comboTracker[senderId].count += 1;
  else comboTracker[senderId].count = 1;

  comboTracker[senderId].lastTime = now;
  return comboTracker[senderId].count;
}

module.exports = { checkCombo };

giftService.js

const Gift = require("../models/Gift");
const Wallet = require("../models/Wallet");
const Audit = require("../models/Audit");
const { generateGiftId, generateSignature } = require("./securityService");
const { checkLucky } = require("../utils/probability");
const { checkCombo } = require("./comboEngine");
const crypto = require("crypto");

async function createGift(senderId, receiverId, amount, type) {
  const senderWallet = await Wallet.findOne({ userId: senderId });
  if (!senderWallet || senderWallet.availableBalance < amount)
    throw new Error("Insufficient Balance");

  const nonce = crypto.randomBytes(16).toString("hex");
  const giftId = generateGiftId(senderId, receiverId, amount, nonce);
  const payload = { giftId, senderId, receiverId, amount };
  const signature = generateSignature(payload);

  // Combo engine
  const comboCount = checkCombo(senderId);
  let bonusMultiplier = comboCount >= 5 ? 1.5 : 1;
  const finalAmount = amount * bonusMultiplier;

  senderWallet.availableBalance -= finalAmount;
  senderWallet.lockedBalance += finalAmount;
  await senderWallet.save();

  const luckyWin = type === "LUCKY" ? checkLucky() : false;

  const gift = await Gift.create({
    giftId,
    senderId,
    receiverId,
    amount: finalAmount,
    type,
    signature,
    nonce
  });

  // Audit block
  await createAuditBlock(giftId);

  return { gift, luckyWin, comboCount };
}

async function claimGift(giftId, claimerId) {
  const gift = await Gift.findOne({ giftId });
  if (!gift) throw new Error("Gift not found");
  if (gift.status !== "LOCKED") throw new Error("Already claimed");
  if (gift.receiverId !== claimerId) throw new Error("Unauthorized");

  const payload = {
    giftId: gift.giftId,
    senderId: gift.senderId,
    receiverId: gift.receiverId,
    amount: gift.amount
  };
  const expectedSignature = generateSignature(payload);
  if (expectedSignature !== gift.signature)
    throw new Error("Signature mismatch");

  const receiverWallet = await Wallet.findOne({ userId: claimerId });
  receiverWallet.availableBalance += gift.amount;
  await receiverWallet.save();

  gift.status = "CLAIMED";
  await gift.save();

  await createAuditBlock(gift.giftId);

  return { success: true, amount: gift.amount };
}

async function createAuditBlock(giftId) {
  const lastBlock = await Audit.findOne().sort({ index: -1 });
  const index = lastBlock ? lastBlock.index + 1 : 1;
  const previousHash = lastBlock ? lastBlock.currentHash : "GENESIS";
  const dataString = index + giftId + previousHash + Date.now();
  const currentHash = crypto
    .createHash("sha256")
    .update(dataString)
    .digest("hex");

  await Audit.create({ index, giftId, previousHash, currentHash });
}

module.exports = { createGift, claimGift };

ЁЯФ╣ API Routes

giftRoutes.js

const express = require("express");
const router = express.Router();
const { createGift, claimGift } = require("../services/giftService");

router.post("/send", async (req, res) => {
  try {
    const { senderId, receiverId, amount, type, roomId } = req.body;
    const result = await createGift(senderId, receiverId, amount, type);

    const io = req.app.get("io");
    io.to(roomId).emit("newGift", {
      senderId,
      receiverId,
      type,
      amount: result.gift.amount,
      animation: result.gift.type,
      lucky: result.luckyWin,
      combo: result.comboCount
    });

    res.json(result);
  } catch (err) {
    res.status(400).json({ error: err.message });
  }
});

router.post("/claim", async (req, res) => {
  try {
    const { giftId, claimerId } = req.body;
    const result = await claimGift(giftId, claimerId);
    res.json(result);
  } catch (err) {
    res.status(400).json({ error: err.message });
  }
});

module.exports = router;

server.js

const express = require("express");
const http = require("http");
const socketIo = require("socket.io");
const mongoose = require("mongoose");
require("dotenv").config();
const connectDB = require("./config/db");
const giftRoutes = require("./routes/giftRoutes");
const helmet = require("helmet");
const cors = require("cors");

const app = express();
const server = http.createServer(app);
const io = socketIo(server, { cors: { origin: "*" } });

connectDB();

app.use(express.json());
app.use(cors());
app.use(helmet());
app.use("/api/gift", giftRoutes);

app.set("io", io);

io.on("connection", (socket) => {
  console.log("User connected:", socket.id);
  socket.on("joinRoom", (roomId) => socket.join(roomId));
});

const PORT = process.env.PORT || 5000;
server.listen(PORT, () => console.log("Server running on", PORT));

4я╕ПтГг Gift Panel UI

GiftPanel.js

import React, { useState } from "react";
import { createGift } from "../services/giftService";

export default function GiftPanel({ roomId, userId }) {
  const [amount, setAmount] = useState(10);
  const [type, setType] = useState("NORMAL");

  const sendGift = async () => {
    try {
      const result = await createGift(userId, roomId, amount, type);
      console.log("Gift sent:", result);
    } catch (err) {
      console.error(err.message);
    }
  };

  return (
    <div className="gift-panel">
      <input type="number" value={amount} onChange={(e) => setAmount(e.target.value)} />
      <select value={type} onChange={(e) => setType(e.target.value)}>
        <option value="NORMAL">Normal</option>
        <option value="LUCKY">Lucky</option>
        <option value="COMBO">Combo</option>
        <option value="TIME_BOMB">Time Bomb</option>
      </select>
      <button onClick={sendGift}>Send Gift</button>
    </div>
  );
}

6я╕ПтГг Leaderboard UI

Leaderboard.js

import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react";
import { fetchLeaderboard } from "../services/giftService";

export default function Leaderboard({ roomId }) {
  const [leaders, setLeaders] = useState([]);

  useEffect(() => {
    const interval = setInterval(async () => {
      const data = await fetchLeaderboard(roomId);
      setLeaders(data.topUsers);
    }, 10000); // refresh every 10 sec
    return () => clearInterval(interval);
  }, [roomId]);

  return (
    <div className="leaderboard">
      {leaders.map((u, i) => (
        <div key={u.userId} className={`leader ${i === 0 ? "top" : ""}`}>
          {u.username} - {u.score}
        </div>
      ))}
    </div>
  );
}

4я╕ПтГг Fraud Detection (Basic Engine)

utils/fraudEngine.js

const userGiftHistory = {};

function checkFraud(senderId) {
  const now = Date.now();
  if(!userGiftHistory[senderId]) userGiftHistory[senderId] = [];
  userGiftHistory[senderId].push(now);

  // Remove entries older than 1 min
  userGiftHistory[senderId] = userGiftHistory[senderId].filter(t => now - t <= 60000);

  if(userGiftHistory[senderId].length > 30) return true; // too many gifts
  return false;
}

module.exports = { checkFraud };

Use in createGift()

const { checkFraud } = require("../utils/fraudEngine");
if(checkFraud(senderId)) {
  throw new Error("Gift rate too high. Possible fraud detected.");
}

7я╕ПтГг Backup Strategy (MongoDB)

Simple Node.js Cron Backup

const { exec } = require("child_process");
const cron = require("node-cron");

cron.schedule("0 2 * * *", () => { // daily 2 AM
  const cmd = `mongodump --uri="${process.env.MONGO_URI}" --out=./backups/$(date +\\%F)`;
  exec(cmd, (err, stdout, stderr) => {
    if(err) console.error("Backup failed:", err);
    else console.log("Backup complete:", stdout);
  });
});

} catch(err) {
  await session.abortTransaction();
  throw err;
} finally {
  session.endSession();
}

3я╕ПтГг Admin Auth (JWT)

// utils/auth.js
const jwt = require("jsonwebtoken");
const SERVER_SECRET = process.env.SERVER_SECRET;

function generateAdminToken(adminId) {
  return jwt.sign({ adminId, role: "ADMIN" }, SERVER_SECRET, { expiresIn: "12h" });
}

function verifyAdminToken(token) {
  try {
    const decoded = jwt.verify(token, SERVER_SECRET);
    if(decoded.role !== "ADMIN") throw new Error("Unauthorized");
    return decoded;
  } catch(err) {
    throw new Error("Invalid Token");
  }
}

module.exports = { generateAdminToken, verifyAdminToken };

4я╕ПтГг Dashboard API (Realtime Stats)

routes/adminRoutes.js

const express = require("express");
const router = express.Router();
const Gift = require("../models/Gift");
const User = require("../models/User");
const Wallet = require("../models/Wallet");

router.get("/stats", async (req, res) => {
  try {
    const totalUsers = await User.countDocuments();
    const totalGifts = await Gift.countDocuments();
    const totalRevenue = await Wallet.aggregate([{ $group: { _id: null, total: { $sum: "$availableBalance" } } }]);

    res.json({ totalUsers, totalGifts, totalRevenue: totalRevenue[0]?.total || 0 });
  } catch(err) {
    res.status(500).json({ error: err.message });
  }
});

module.exports = router;

export function triggerGiftAnimation({ senderId, type, lucky }) {
    const scene = getScene(); // Three.js scene reference

    // Sky portal crack
    if(type === "LUCKY" && lucky) {
        createSkyPortal(scene);

    createImpactShockwave(scene, diamond.position);

    // Leaderboard glow

}

// Example utility functions
function createDiamondMesh(type) {
    const geometry = new THREE.OctahedronGeometry(1);
    const material = new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({ color: typeColor(type) });
    return new THREE.Mesh(geometry, material);
}

function typeColor(type) {
    switch(type) {
        case "LUCKY": return 0xffd700; // Gold
        case "COMBO": return 0xff4500; // Orange
        default: return 0xffffff;
    }
}

let comboCounter = {};

export function updateCombo(senderId) {
    const now = Date.now();
    if(!comboCounter[senderId]) comboCounter[senderId] = { count: 1, lastTime: now };
    else {
        const diff = now - comboCounter[senderId].lastTime;
        comboCounter[senderId].count = diff <= 10000 ? comboCounter[senderId].count + 1 : 1;
        comboCounter[senderId].lastTime = now;
    }
    showComboVisual(senderId, comboCounter[senderId].count);
}

function showComboVisual(senderId, count) {
    // Display floating combo text above sender's avatar
    const el = document.getElementById(`combo-${senderId}`);
    if(el) el.innerText = `ЁЯФе ${count}/5 COMBO!`;
}

src/utils/animationUtils.js

import * as THREE from "three";
import { GLTFLoader } from "three/examples/jsm/loaders/GLTFLoader.js";
import { spawnParticles } from "./particleUtils.js";

export function triggerGiftAnimation({ senderId, type, lucky }, scene) {
    const loader = new GLTFLoader();

    // Sky Portal for Lucky gift
    if(type === "LUCKY" && lucky){
        loader.load("/assets/3dModels/skyPortal.glb", (gltf) => {
            const portal = gltf.scene;
            scene.add(portal);
            portal.position.set(0, 5, -5);
            spawnParticles(scene, portal.position, "sparkle");
        });
    }

    // Diamond drop
    loader.load("/assets/3dModels/diamond.glb", (gltf) => {
        const diamond = gltf.scene;
        diamond.position.set(Math.random()*4-2, 10, Math.random()*4-2);
        scene.add(diamond);

        // Animate drop
        let y = 10;
        const drop = () => {
            y -= 0.2;
            diamond.position.y = y;
            if(y > 1) requestAnimationFrame(drop);
        }
        drop();

        spawnParticles(scene, diamond.position, "sparkle");
    });
}

4я╕ПтГг PARTICLE SYSTEM

src/utils/particleUtils.js

import * as THREE from "three";

export function spawnParticles(scene, position, type) {
    const particlesGeometry = new THREE.BufferGeometry();
    const particlesCount = 100;
    const positions = new Float32Array(particlesCount * 3);

    for(let i=0; i<particlesCount*3; i++){
        positions[i] = (Math.random() - 0.5) * 2;
    }
    particlesGeometry.setAttribute('position', new THREE.BufferAttribute(positions, 3));

    const material = new THREE.PointsMaterial({ color: 0xffffff, size: 0.1 });
    const particles = new THREE.Points(particlesGeometry, material);
    particles.position.copy(position);
    scene.add(particles);

    setTimeout(() => scene.remove(particles), 2000);
}

2я╕ПтГг ENGAGEMENT ENGINE

src/ai/engagementEngine.js

// Calculates engagement score and adjusts animation intensity
export function calculateEngagement({ reactions, repeatGifts, watchDuration, chatSpike }) {
    return 0.4 * reactions + 0.3 * repeatGifts + 0.2 * watchDuration + 0.1 * chatSpike;
}

// Adjust animation intensity based on engagement
export function adjustAnimationIntensity(animationType, engagementScore) {
    if(engagementScore > 80) return "QuantumSkyBreak";
    if(engagementScore > 50) return "ThunderStorm";
    if(engagementScore > 25) return "RoyalBlast";
    return "GoldenBurst";
}

// Adjust room lighting based on activity
export function adjustRoomLighting(scene, engagementScore) {
    const intensity = Math.min(1, engagementScore / 100);
    scene.background = new THREE.Color(`hsl(200, 50%, ${50 + intensity*30}%)`);
}

import { checkLucky } from "../utils/probability.js";

// Predict Lucky trigger probability
export function predictiveLucky({ userAvgSpend, roomEnergy, timeOfDay }) {
    let baseChance = 45; // default 45%
    if(roomEnergy < 30) baseChance += 15; // boost if room is dull
    if(userAvgSpend > 100) baseChance += 10; 
    if(timeOfDay >= 22 || timeOfDay < 6) baseChance += 5; // night bonus
    return Math.min(baseChance, 90); // cap at 90%
}

// Predict combo bonus multiplier
export function predictiveCombo(currentComboCount) {
    if(currentComboCount >= 5) return 1.5;
    if(currentComboCount >= 3) return 1.2;
    return 1;
}

// Decide if Lucky triggers dynamically
export function shouldLuckyTrigger(predictedChance) {
    return Math.random() * 100 <= predictedChance;
}

2я╕ПтГг PSYCHOLOGICAL FEEDBACK ENGINE

src/ai/psychoFeedback.js

// Adjust camera, sound & lighting based on engagement
export function adaptiveCamera(scene, topUsers, engagementScore) {
    // Focus on top gift sender
    if(topUsers.length > 0) {
        const targetUser = topUsers[0];
        scene.camera.lookAt(targetUser.position);
        scene.camera.fov = 60 + engagementScore * 0.2; // widen for hype
    }
}

// Adaptive sound volume and pitch
export function adaptiveSound(audioContext, baseVolume, engagementScore) {
    const gain = audioContext.createGain();
    gain.gain.value = Math.min(1, baseVolume + engagementScore / 100);
    audioContext.destination.gain = gain.gain.value;
}

// Psychological lighting effects
export function adaptiveLighting(scene, engagementScore) {
    const intensity = Math.min(1, engagementScore / 100);
    scene.lights.forEach(light => {
        light.intensity = 0.5 + intensity * 1.5; // bright for hype
        light.color.setHSL(0.6, 0.8, 0.5 + intensity * 0.5);
    });
}

// Full feedback loop
export function psychoFeedbackLoop(scene, audioContext, topUsers, engagementScore) {
    adaptiveCamera(scene, topUsers, engagementScore);
    adaptiveSound(audioContext, 0.5, engagementScore);
    adaptiveLighting(scene, engagementScore);
}

4я╕ПтГг CI/CD PIPELINE (GITHUB ACTIONS EXAMPLE)

.github/workflows/deploy.yml

name: CI/CD Pipeline

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  build-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Set up Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v3
        with:
          node-version: 20

      - name: Install Dependencies
        run: npm ci

      - name: Run Tests
        run: npm test

      - name: Build Docker
        run: docker build -t muqaddas-backend ./backend

      - name: Push Docker (to DockerHub)
        run: |
          echo ${{ secrets.DOCKER_PASSWORD }} | docker login -u ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }} --password-stdin
          docker tag muqaddas-backend ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }}/muqaddas-backend:latest
          docker push ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }}/muqaddas-backend:latest

      - name: Deploy to Server
        uses: easingthemes/ssh-deploy@v2
        with:
          ssh-private-key: ${{ secrets.SERVER_SSH_KEY }}
          remote-user: ubuntu
          server-ip: ${{ secrets.SERVER_IP }}
          local-path: "./deploy"
          remote-path: "/home/ubuntu/muqaddas"

Secrets required: DOCKER_USERNAME, DOCKER_PASSWORD, SERVER_SSH_KEY, SERVER_IP

class ZakatEngine:
    def __init__(self):
        self.host_revenue = {}
        self.zakat_rates = {}  # live currency/gold rates can be pulled via API
        self.charity = {}

    # Calculate Zakat for a host
    def calculate_zakat(self, host_id, revenue):
        nisab = 5000  # example threshold
        zakat_percent = 2  # 2% for charity
        zakat_due = revenue * zakat_percent / 100
        self.host_revenue[host_id] = revenue - zakat_due
        self.charity[host_id] = zakat_due
        return self.host_revenue[host_id], self.charity[host_id]

    # 69% Host Revenue Protection
    def distribute_host_revenue(self, host_id, total_revenue):
        host_share = total_revenue * 0.69
        platform_share = total_revenue - host_share
        self.host_revenue[host_id] = host_share
        return {"host": host_share, "platform": platform_share}

class WalletEngine:
    def __init__(self):
        self.user_coins = {}
    
    def add_coins(self, user_id, amount):
        if user_id not in self.user_coins:
            self.user_coins[user_id] = 0
        self.user_coins[user_id] += amount
        return self.user_coins[user_id]
    
    def spend_coins(self, user_id, amount):
        if self.user_coins.get(user_id, 0) >= amount:
            self.user_coins[user_id] -= amount
            return True
        return False

        self.leaderboard[user_id] += points
        return self.leaderboard[user_id]

# -------------------------

class SuperEventEngine:
    def __init__(self):
        self.active_events = {}      # event_id : event_data
        self.vip_rewards = {}        # user_id : rewards

    # Create a new super event
    def create_event(self, event_id, name, reward_multiplier=2):
        self.active_events[event_id] = {
            "name": name,
            "reward_multiplier": reward_multiplier,
            "participants": []
        }
        return self.active_events[event_id]

    # User participates in event
    def participate_event(self, user_id, event_id, base_points):
        if event_id not in self.active_events:
            return None
        multiplier = self.active_events[event_id]["reward_multiplier"]
        points_earned = base_points * multiplier
        self.active_events[event_id]["participants"].append(user_id)
        # Update VIP rewards
        if user_id not in self.vip_rewards:
            self.vip_rewards[user_id] = 0
        self.vip_rewards[user_id] += points_earned
        return points_earned

    # Get top VIP users
    def top_vip_users(self, n=5):
        return sorted(self.vip_rewards.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)[:n]

class RealTimeDashboard:
    def __init__(self):
        self.user_data = {}  # user_id : data dictionary
        self.notifications = []

    # Update user stats (coins, points, VIP, charity)
    def update_user(self, user_id, coins=0, vip_points=0, charity=0):
        if user_id not in self.user_data:
            self.user_data[user_id] = {"coins":0, "vip_points":0, "charity":0}
        self.user_data[user_id]["coins"] += coins
        self.user_data[user_id]["vip_points"] += vip_points
        self.user_data[user_id]["charity"] += charity
        return self.user_data[user_id]

    # Send notification
    def notify(self, msg):
        self.notifications.append(msg)
        return msg

    # Get top users by coins or VIP points
    def top_users(self, by="coins", n=5):
        return sorted(self.user_data.items(), key=lambda x: x[1][by], reverse=True)[:n]

    # Get live dashboard data
    def live_dashboard(self):
        return self.user_data

class GlobalSimulation:

    # Photon Matrix: Product тЖТ Digital Matter
    interaction = photon_engine.user_interaction(user_id, product_id, product_data)
    
    # Wallet Coins
    coins_earned = interaction["rewards"]["stars"] * 10
    wallet_engine.add_coins(user_id, coins_earned)
    
    # Super Event VIP Points
    vip_points = super_event_engine.participate_event(user_id, event_id, interaction["rewards"]["diamonds"])
    
    # Host Revenue & Zakat
    revenue_distribution = zakat_engine.distribute_host_revenue(host_id, revenue)
    host_final, charity_amount = zakat_engine.calculate_zakat(host_id, revenue_distribution["host"])
    
    # Update Dashboard
    dashboard.update_user(user_id, coins=coins_earned, vip_points=vip_points, charity=charity_amount)
    
    # Laser Front-End Notification
    notification = laser_front_end.touch_product(user_id, product_id, product_data["name"])
    dashboard.notify(notification)
    
    return dashboard.user_data[user_id]

Goal: Hard-Matter product scan, 45% Stars/Diamonds, 20% Agency Commission.

# Photon Matrix v4.0 тАУ Core Injection
class PhotonMatrix:
    def __init__(self):
        self.products = {}
        self.stars = {}
        self.agency_commission = 0.2  # 20% placeholder

    def scan_product(self, product_id, user_touch=False):
        """Scan product to Digital DNA and materialize in 3D"""
        self.products[product_id] = {'digital_dna': f"DNA_{product_id}"}
        if user_touch:
            self.generate_stars(product_id)
        self.lock_agency_commission(product_id)

    def generate_stars(self, product_id):
        import random
        chance = random.randint(1,100)
        if chance <= 45:  # 45% winning logic
            self.stars[product_id] = {'stars': random.randint(1,5)}
        else:
            self.stars[product_id] = {'stars':0}

    def lock_agency_commission(self, product_id):
        # Commission placeholder lock
        self.products[product_id]['commission_locked'] = True

Notes:

RK bas scan_product(product_id, True) call karega.

Stars/Diamonds automatically calculate.

Agency Commission permanently kernel-level lock.

2я╕ПтГг Wallet & Transaction Engine

Goal: тВ╣15 Transaction Logic, Live Global Counter, Auto Zakat.

class WalletEngine:
    def __init__(self):
        self.users = {}
        self.global_charity = 0
        self.global_maintenance = 0

    def create_user(self, user_id, balance=0):
        self.users[user_id] = {'balance': balance}

    def process_transaction(self, user_id, amount):
        maintenance = 10
        patient = 5
        self.global_maintenance += maintenance
        self.global_charity += patient
        self.users[user_id]['balance'] += (amount - maintenance - patient)
        # Zakat & 69% host logic can be added per user

Notes:

RK bas process_transaction(user_id, amount) call karega.

тВ╣10 maintenance + тВ╣5 patient auto deduct, global counter update.

3я╕ПтГг Zakat & 69% Host Revenue Protection

class ZakatEngine:
    def __init__(self):
        self.host_revenue = {}
        self.zakat_percentage = 0.025  # 2.5% Zakat

    def record_host(self, host_id, revenue):
        zakat = revenue * self.zakat_percentage
        host_final = revenue - zakat
        self.host_revenue[host_id] = {'final': host_final, 'zakat': zakat}

    def calculate_global_zakat(self):
        total_zakat = sum([x['zakat'] for x in self.host_revenue.values()])
        return total_zakat

Notes:

RK ka system automatically host revenue protect karega aur Zakat calculate.

Identity private, 69% revenue secure.

class EventEngine:

        self.leaderboard = {}

    def update_event_points(self, user_id, points):
        if user_id in self.leaderboard:
            self.leaderboard[user_id] += points
        else:
            self.leaderboard[user_id] = points
        # Sort leaderboard descending
        self.leaderboard = dict(sorted(self.leaderboard.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True))
